Comment.Language: For the Fast of the Apostles:

Text.Language: Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ nao#c# n~io] n~a~poctoloc: nem p~cepi n~te nimay/t/c: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf: O my lords and fathers the apostles: and the rest of the disciples: that He may forgive us our sins.
اطلبوا من الرب عنا ياسادتى الآباء الرسل وبقية التلاميذ ليغفر لنا خطايانا
